characterDescription:
Plamry, according to Brandon, was stranded to keep him from interfering. However, he was left alone when his friend and superior Nikli, melted into bugs. He's probably having a hard time with that.
He then recovered at the end of the book, after the last chapter. Plamry is okay physically. What it does to various people to watch people you have known melt into bugs ... depends on the individual.
